name: Brimstone (itch) (Van de Walle Sam)
description:
This game is a group project created in just under 12 weeks by Dieter Tack (Programmer), Sam Van de Walle (Programmer), Tom Ryckeboer (Programmer), Matthias Degroote (Artist) and Bert Suffys (Artist).

Brimstone is a short co-op RPG like game that consist of +/- 15 min story line and an endless arena survival mode, this game was produced with WebGL as target platform.

To learn more about the game and its development you can follow this link:
https://daeteam02blog.wordpress.com/
